explains: adj. 第八的；八分之一的

sentences.en: This will be his eighth title bout in 19 months.
sentences.cn: 这将是他19个月中的第八次比赛夺冠。

sentences.en: The play is open to all seventh and eighth graders.
sentences.cn: 所有七、八年级的学生均可观看此剧。

sentences.en: By the ninth hour the car was running in eighth position.
sentences.cn: 比赛进行到第9个小时的时候该赛车跑在第8位。
